name: Monster Slayer (vlad79x)
description:
You go back to testing artificially made monsters. You are going to test one of the strongest one they ever made, they even made a custom arena were they test it. You get hit a couple times by the fireballs and things go downhill from there. So downhill you will probably encounter "him" again.

W-A-S-D - Movement

Space - Jump

Left-Mouse - Shoot

Shift - Slide Forward

Ctrl - Crouch
